title: Tryndamere late game

embed.description: Winning is an inevitability if Tryndamere hits 6 items because his damage to structures is unlike anything in the game. "Vintage Education" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com) Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0 http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/ "Vibe Ace" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com) Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0 http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/

body: The absurd damage to minions combined with high lifesteal and lack of reliance on armor allows you to do crazy things, like restore health while both nexus turrets are hitting you, 2 shot carries, and destroy an inhibitor before people can move a screen length to stop you.

replies.body: I've been saying this guys stupid for ages and nobody listens to me -_- "just CC him" well why dont you just cc every fking champ in the game then we can all agree we're all bad and no champ is op

Careful, people don't like anti-Tryn talk around here.  He's "quite balanced" whenever I bring up how toxic he is.

Agreed btw.  He can do the most ridiculous stuff with no defense whatsoever, and I can't even fathom how anyone thinks it's balanced.

Also, when people say "just CC him" that isn't an cure, it just slows the bleeding.   Most CC worth a damn is a skillshot and he rarely stands still since whoever he is destroying is running for their life or dying so fast he just moves on to the next guy in a second or less(when he isn't dashing out of the way).  When you actually do land CC, yay!  But unless you got more CC around to chain him for a bit, one move(unless you're morg :P) doesn't last long enough to kill him, and if he hadn't ulted yet he can just do it stunned.
